name: FGP Solutions
tag_list: android, ios, mobile-apps, app-development, android-apps, ios-apps, mobile-applications, marketing-apps, marketing-applications, creative-marketing, app-solutions, phone-apps, smartphone, smart-phone, new-apps
overview:
FGP Solutions, Inc (www.fgpsolutions.com) is a Vancouver based software development company with focus on enterprise specific apps. We help companies develop internal apps for own operation or publish apps to public to attract clients, present new ideas and collect marketing data.

Apps are universal for both iOS and Android for smartphones and tablets

Creative marketing, user engagement and data analysis are only few benefits of developing a custom app and establishing your presence in Android and IOs market.
